long_desc: Displays the help menu. It can also be used to gather further details of a command by using the command as an argument.
Displays the help menu. It can also be used to gather further details of a command by using the command as an argument.

short_desc: Purges a number of messages from the channel
long_desc: Purges a number of messages from the text channel. The number of messages are input, and can be between 1 and 100.
